newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Asian Props holders approve capital return.
newsitem.headline: Asian Props holders approve capital return.

text.p: Asian Properties Ltd said on Thursday that a shareholders' meeting had approved a return of capital of NZ$1.45 per share after which shares would be cancelled

When the board announced a capital reduction last month the company said the reduction could not realistically proceed without completion of the sale of the President Hotel in Malaysia, which has been delayed.
Shareholders also approved application for declisting of the company should the number of shareholders be less than 75.
